message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business. As we're just starting the negotiation, I'm willing to offer it to you for $800000. This is a great starting point, and I'm confident we can work together to find a mutually beneficial price.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to my business.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $850000. I believe this is a fair price, considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to my business.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand that you're still looking for a better deal. After reconsidering, I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'll sell the product to you for $800000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and my initial investment.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not ready to meet you at $800000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $825000 and $800000, so I'll offer $812500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to my business.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to accept $812500. I'll make one more counteroffer. I'll sell the product to you for $795000. This is the best price I can offer, considering the product's value and my initial investment.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not ready to meet you at $795000. I'm willing to make one last offer. I'll give you $790000, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and potential benefits to my business.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to accept $790000. I've already gone as low as I can, and I'm not willing to give up more value. I'll make one final counteroffer. I'll sell the product to you for $785000. This is the absolute lowest price I can accept, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go below $800000. I'm willing to make one final offer. I'll give you $800000, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to accept this offer, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1200000.
